channel.title: RS2006 - EmberScape(Old-School Remake)
channel.description:
Notice: this is our own Framework, we are like NOT Vault.
[center][IMG]http://img820.imageshack.us/img820/4698/emberscapebanner.png[/img] Team: [img]http://th935.photobucket.com/albums/ad198/bailey_067/th_o_crown.gif[/img] Cart [img]http://th935.photobucket.com/albums/ad198/bailey_067/th_o_crown.gif[/img] SiniSoul [img]http://th935.photobucket.com/albums/ad198/bailey_067/th_o_crown.gif[/img] MrCanada
[center] [size=36pt]Features[/size]
Item system OnDemand JagGrab Update Control Player Updating Sinisoul's Nio Networking API[/center]
Green || Orange || Red Finished || Unfinished || Not started[center]
[size=36pt]System [/size]
Player Saving Player Loading Walking Packet Handling Handle all packets NPC Rendering Script System Item System [center]
[size=36pt]Skills(By priority)[/size]
Woodcutting Mining Fishing Player Combat NPC Combat Prayer Ranged Magic Smithing Cooking Firemaking Crafting Fletching Runecrafting Thieving Agility Slayer Herblore[/center]
[center][size=36pt]Quest and Minigames[/size]
Cook's Assistant Dragon Slayer Romeo & Juliet Rune Mysteries Dorics Quest Desert Treasure The Fremennik Trials Getrudes Cat Heroes Quest Horror from the Deep Legends Quest Lost City Monkey Madness Castle Wars Duel Arena Barrows[/center]
[center][size=24pt]Media[/size]
[img]http://img546.imageshack.us/img546/8774/1e7349d1908948c48d5db1a.png[/img] [img]http://img863.imageshack.us/img863/3966/a76cb5634c744a4f85e8699.png[/img] [img]http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/1440/24c691a0441f497b8e1111d.png[/img] [/center]
[center][size=24pt]Video's[/size][/center] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o-Q78bTTOOw
[center][size=24pt]Update Log[/size][/center]
99% Forums and Website

// Decompiled by Jad v1.5.8f. Copyright 2001 Pavel Kouznetsov.

Been playing around with the version list so that we can produce custom updates in the future.

item.title: RS2006 - EmberScape(Old-School Remake)
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Cart, post:143, topic:400774”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=497830.msg3661109#msg3661109 date=1310354223]

Lol, did you just de-rep me for posting for someone else? Honestly, did you think I would cry or something?

Anyway, entering the argument myself, it seems you guys are being pompous asses about the issue. Revealing IP addresses? I’m fairly sure that is illegal as it is endangering person’s privacy over the internet.

PS. 7 pages of bullshit. Why hasn’t a mod entered yet?

so breaching security and SQL Injecting is legal?

Go spam somewhere else gov.

It’s illegal why? It’s technically hacking. Oh wait, hacking is illegal. Oh wait it’s immunity because he lives in a different freaking country.

Breaching security. Did you just call it legal? Are you an idiot?
[/quote]

and I hope you also know what the word Sarcasm is.[/quote]

Sarcasm? You’re posting on a server development topic, I’m fairly sure it’s supposed to be serious. Unless this topic is a joke. apparently it is.

Read full topic

item.title: RS2006 - EmberScape(Old-School Remake)
item.dc:creator: @Cart Cart
item.description:
@Cart wrote:

sinisoul:

Alright I am done, Dawn will receive no credit for anything for being a stubborn faggot. All references to Dawn will be removed and all posts relating to the topic will be ignored. We played nice and took no credit, Emberscape 317 now claims every file on the web server as our intellectual property. You have a problem? Leave a PM and I will delete it.

Read full topic
